Once upon a time, Brian wrote :

> On Mon, 19 Aug 2002 16:44:30 +0200, Matthias Saou <matthias@egwn.net>
> wrote:
> 
> [snipped]
> 
> > Then why bother : The new Red Hat Linux beta "(null)" is now available
> > and should be announced anytime now. It contains rpm 4.1-0.81.
> > 
> > You can grab it from here :
> > ftp://ftp.freshrpms.net/pub/redhat/linux/beta/null/
> 
>     What's the official "apt" line for it?  Is it just 7.4 instead of
>     7.3, or did they make this one 8.0?

This is a beta, probably of 8.0 although it's numbered 7.3.94. As such,
I've set up no apt repository for it, although you may find a few of my
packages recompiled for it under the /pub/freshrpms/null/ directory of my
ftp server.

Matthias
